name: Ext_R3_GuidanceResponse_context
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.GuidanceResponse.context for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents GuidanceResponse.context from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/GuidanceResponse|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Encounter or Episode during which the response was returned
element.definition: Allows the context of the guidance response to be provided if available. In a service context, this would likely be unavailable.
element.comment: `GuidanceResponse.encounter` maps to R5 `GuidanceResponse.encounter`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
